import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { Container, Row, Col, Button, Modal } from 'react-bootstrap'; import './Services.css'; function Services() { const [showModal, setShowModal] = useState(false); const [serviceDescription, setServiceDescription] = useState(''); const handleServiceClick = (description) => { setServiceDescription(description); setShowModal(true); } return (
